name: delimitation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the marking or describing of the limits of something: The main focus was the delimitation of responsibilities between the police and the judiciary.
More examplesFewer examplesThere was a constitutional review of the delimitation of powers between Brussels and national capitals.The country instituted proceedings at the International Court of Justice calling for a delimitation of the maritime boundary. The delimitation of the sea is the most pressing security issue affecting the region. At the horizon where the sky and sea met, the delimitation could scarcely be discerned.
